site_name: Harrow Civic CentreStation RoadHarrowHA1 2XY
description: Hybrid planning application for the phased demolition of all existing structures and site preparation works and the phased construction of apartment blocks and townhouses (Use Class C3), along with flexible commercial, business and service (Use Class E) / learning and non-residential institutions and local community floorspace (Use Classes F1(d), F1(e)and F2(b)); cycle and vehicle parking, highway and access alterations, childrens play space, public realm enhancements, associated landscaping and works to trees. (Full planning application to include new residential homes (Use Class C3); flexible commercial, business and service floorspace (Use Class E); cycle and vehicle parking, highway andaccess alterations, childrens play space, public realm enhancements, associated landscaping and works to trees. Outline planning application (all matters reserved) for new residential homes (Use Class C3) and flexible commercial, business and service floorspace (Use Class E), learning and non-residential institutions or local community floorspace (Use Classes F1(d), F1(e) and F2(b)). (Out of Borough)
